html:
4.22.23  3:10 pm   have politics affected your dish-washing schedule much?

      no

4.22.23  2:42 pm   favorite shark

      the mechanical shark which failed and therefore did not appear in most of the JAWS film, causing the audience to imagine their own shark

4.22.23  10:51 am   how are you so good at music. like wtf

      i've sold my soul back to myself at a discount price

4.22.23  10:44 am   when did you first start animating?

     about 2014

     and would you consider yourself really good at it now

     not quite

4.22.23  10:06 am   thoughts on concrete

      too soft

4.22.23  9:30 am   the carrots are healthy, but are they good for health?

      let me perform some calculations

4.22.23  3:13 am   do you think you can you teach people to be good at art?

      no but maybe i can trick them into letting that occur

4.22.23  1:45 am   are you weird

      no

4.21.23  11:10 pm   would you like to go ice skating?

      maybe a little later

4.21.23  7:36 pm   thoughts on thoughts

      i can't believe it

4.21.23  6:15 pm   How do i satisfy my little thrill-seeking heart when i have to go through all the bland stuff, that i need to do in order to stay on track :/

      how about making a tutorial about this challenge

4.21.23  3:20 pm   are you funny

      it's on my to-do list

4.21.23  1:56 pm   how do you write things that sound so dream like? its weirdly impressive

      at each moment i ask myself 'what would a dream do here?'

4.21.23  12:47 pm   In your website, when we open a tab, why did you place the first letter in a random place?

      for emphasis, but it can't be random, because in most cases i had to try several different ways until i found one i liked

4.21.23  12:29 pm   Do you prefer to respond with long answers to short questions or short answers to long questions? 

      My preference is for the answer to contain exactly the same number of characters as the question.

4.21.23  10:42 am   is mount saint helens still about to blow up

      i don't know anything about mount st helens' eruption schedule

4.21.23  8:06 am   did you learn music jargon to communicate with others, or for individual use (documentation, thinking, etc)?

      both

4.21.23  4:41 am   opinion on soup?

      adheres surprisingly well to the laws of physics

4.21.23  4:15 am   What's the strangest thing you've encountered in Central Park?

      billionaire's row

4.21.23  3:55 am   wizard tips?

      each wizard is another wizard

4.21.23  2:46 am   where do you get the inspiration for your absurdism dialogues? bc it's honestly so intriguing and ngl im in awe at how your videos can talk about everything and nothing at the same time.

      the core technique is to try to find what would excite me at each moment, given the entire context of the video elapsed so far

4.21.23  12:35 am   is there a word for when, during a chorus or a verse or a phrase that is repeated in a song, sometimes artists will change one note in the melody of the final or penultimate repetition?

      sure. i call that 'variation'

4.21.23  12:01 am   Hey, I've semi-recently become the lead singer in a band, and when we eventually do our own stuff, I wanted to know if you had an music writing tips?

      not 'had'. 'will have'. as you said, this moment is in the future

4.20.23  8:51 pm   What's the soup of the day today?

      no soup today

4.20.23  6:05 pm   if  you could be a tree, which one would you be?

      if they were all combined i would try to be that one

4.20.23  6:04 pm   how do I make good music?

      no one knows. but that never stopped anyone from doing it

4.20.23  5:23 pm   In the song "I'm Scared," did you actually feel depressed/anxious at that time?

     excited

     asking bc i related veeery strongly to it and i just want to know if im ok

4.20.23  4:05 pm   I want to make music because I have a lot of ideas in my head that sound stupid when said out loud.  Do you think I should try and learn an instrument or use some music software?

      sure

4.20.23  3:49 pm   What can I do to become smarter, or think logically?

      first you have to choose which one you want to do

4.20.23  2:55 pm   is steve's name really steve?

      let me perform some calculations

4.20.23  1:56 pm   have you ever tried meowing like a cat to relieve stress?

     i don't recall

     i wonder why it works

4.20.23  12:55 pm   will people make fun of me if i make my music on garage band

      the person most likely to make fun of you for this, is you

4.20.23  10:13 am   fav things ab animations and jazz?

      putting them together

4.20.23  8:36 am   does the corner store sell soap?

      soap hasn't been invented yet

4.20.23  7:39 am   the crops failed, what about the next batch?

      might not fail

4.20.23  5:18 am   Are you a fine arts kind of guy

      art is filled with things we thought would not be fine, but seem just right for the current moment despite this

4.20.23  4:32 am   Do you have modulations that you don't like, or tend to avoid naturally? 

      music is filled with things we thought we didn't like, but seem just right for the current moment despite this

4.20.23  4:24 am   why am i so dumb and stupid

      due to intelligence

4.20.23  2:08 am   How do I find the previous question I asked? I already forgot what I asked but I still want to know the answer.

      was it this one

4.20.23  1:53 am   How do i get inspiration to make things?

      how did you get inspiration to want to get inspiration to make things?

4.20.23  12:56 am   how do i come up with a good piano chord melody? 

      focus on something that's not a melody, then make a melody in response to that non-melody thing. examples of a non-melody: a thing. an event. a day. a person. a scenario

4.20.23  12:28 am   what do you recommend as a first job?

      being born

4.19.23  10:44 pm   do you listen to pink floyd

      i have overheard pink floyd

4.19.23  10:26 pm   what time will time end?

     some other time

     I wonder if it will be a tuesday or not.

     it will be either all or none of the days

4.19.23  9:35 pm   if i hate college, and I'm pretty sure I'd hate it regardless of major, is it better to quit

      i'm not sure. college itself seems like some kind of trick question, to which i don't know the answer

4.19.23  8:30 pm   do you like it when people ask you stupid questions

      what the heck is a stupid question

4.19.23  7:37 pm   did you get good grades in high school?

      mostly Delightful, and Fantastic

4.19.23  6:42 pm   For "I'm a huge gamer most of the time", the Rhodes keys accompinent that plays in the musical into bit, does it play like a Bbmin then a bit of Eb Lydian?.

     i wouldn't think to call it Eb lydian, but yes it does extremely briefly borrow from what i guess i'd call Bb ionian (which would be equivalent i guess). the higher of the 2 chord voicings, briefly breaks the ceiling of the Bb dorian paradigm that has otherwise been generally established

     And for the bit "and its just like the real thing and it's giving me a cool sensation. And I'm climbing up the leaderboad for days and days" . Are the chords Esus4 Amaj E sus4 Amaj Bmin F#minor(sus?).

     more like E7sus4, Amaj9 a couple of times, then definitely gonna be something more like Bmin7, then some kind of F#min9 ish

      But for the bit after I have no clue ("I noticed " and so on).

     F/G, G/A ... D/G, Eb/Ab

     And for the bit " isn't that peculiar information" do u go Bmin of some sort to A major of some sort?

     more like B7sus4, A7sus4

     I cant decipher many of the sus voicings myself

4.19.23  6:23 pm   the part in i'm scared at the start of the verse where it goes i'm sca-a-a-a-ared is it playing the melody in the instrumentation but with a tritone difference to the real melody, or is it something else? I'm jsut wondering because it sounds cool.

      3 notes at a time. one is a major 3rd below the melody, one is the same as the melody, and the other is a half step above the melody. it's the same exact shape, just moving with the melody. starting with A, C#, D

4.19.23  5:31 pm   How would you explain the concept of infinity?

      it's something with no end
